pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analysis of Honeycomb Selection Designs // A useful statistical tool for the construction and analysis of Honeycomb Selection Designs. More information about this type of designs: Fasoula V. (2013) doi:10.1002/9781118497869.ch6 Fasoula V.A., and Tokatlidis I.S. (2012) doi:10.1007/s13593-011-0034-0 Fasoulas A.C., and Fasoula V.A. (1995) doi:10.1002/9780470650059.ch3 Tokatlidis I. (2016) doi:10.1017/S0014479715000150 Tokatlidis I., and Vlachostergios D. (2016) doi:10.3390/d8040029.
